value.name: Historic Nevada State Prison tours sold out, more planned at later dates
value.description: Tours this weekend and June 5 for the historic Nevada State Prison in Carson City are now filled and sold out. More tours will be announced at a later date at the website here. *** Be one of the first to go to prison.

value.name: Fishing Report: The sun is hot and the days are longer, a perfect recipe for spring fishing
value.description: The sun is hot and the days are longer, a perfect recipe for spring fishing. I spoke with the committee for the Lampe Park kids' fishing event last week. Due to safety concerns for both the families and volunteers due to COVID-19,
